p: This command will automatically create a folder in your content/ directory with the
Type name, a _blueprint.json file inside that folder that describes the Type's field
structure, and a corresponding template in layout/content/ that has the same name as the Type.
You can create a new content type by running plenti new type YOUR_NEW_TYPE.

head: Long
Short
Description
data: Pass "false" if you don't want your new Type to have an endpoint that site visitors can access directly
